name: KenmoreSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, set the air conditioner to 70 degrees”
”Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart what is the door status of my refrigerator?”
”Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart how much time is left on my washer?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kenmore smart
des:
Kenmore Smart connectivity transforms your relationship with your home. Personalize the way Kenmore Smart appliances operate based on your schedule and daily routines, making life easier and providing greater peace of mind. With Amazon Alexa, you can interact with your Kenmore Smart appliances just by using your voice.

To get started, first activate your Kenmore Smart appliances through the Kenmore Smart app and/or the Kenmore Smart AC app. Then, select the 'Enable Skill' button above to link your Kenmore Smart appliances to Alexa. Log in with your Kenmore SYW account name and password to complete the link between Alexa and your Kenmore Smart appliances. 

Supported products:
Kenmore Elite Smart Air conditioner
Models: 77087, 77107, 77127, 77157, 77187 and 77247
Kenmore Elite Smart French Door Bottom-Mount Refrigerator
Model: 7259X, 7310x, 7311x, 7411x, 7504x, 7505x
Kenmore Elite Smart Front-Load Washer
Models: 4198x
Kenmore Elite Smart Front-Load Dryer
Models: 8198x, 9198x
Kenmore Elite Dishwasher
Models: 1467x
Kenmore Elite Smart Hybrid Water Softener
Model: 38620
Kenmore Smart Electric Water Heater Module
Model: 58000

You can use the following phrases to interact with your Kenmore Smart Appliances:

Kenmore Smart Air conditioner

Alexa, turn on <deviceName>
Alexa, turn off <deviceName>
Alexa, set the <deviceName> to number degrees”
Alexa, increase the <deviceName> by number degrees”
Alexa, decrease the <deviceName> by number degrees”
Alexa, what is the <deviceName> set to?

* You can view or change your <deviceName> in the Alexa app.

Kenmore Smart Refrigerator

Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart what is my refrigerator’s freezer temperature?
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart what is my refrigerator’s temperature?
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart what is the door status of my refrigerator?
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart to set my refrigerator’s temperature to 37 degrees.
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart to change my refrigerator’s temperature to its recommended value. 
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart to turn on the ice-maker in my refrigerator.

Kenmore Smart Washer/Dryer

Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart how much time is remaining on my dryer cycle?
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart what is my washer doing?
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart what is my dryer doing?
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart to start my washer.
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart to pause my dryer.
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart if I need to run clean washer.
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart is my washer able to be started?

Kenmore Smart Dishwasher

Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart what is my dishwasher doing?
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart how much time is remaining on my dishwasher cycle?
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart do I need rinse aid?

Kenmore Smart Water Heater

Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart what my water heater temp is.
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart to set my water heater to standard mode.
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart to set my water heater to energy saver mode.
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart to set my water heater to 100 degrees.

Kenmore Smart Water Softener

Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart what is my water softener’s current salt level?
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart what time is my water softener set to recharge?
Alexa, ask Kenmore Smart how much water is my water softener using?

Have questions? Use the Kenmore Smart app or one of the options below to reach out to us.
Web: http://www.kenmore.com/customer-care
Email: kenmoresupport@searshc.com
